title: Circle
lyrics:
Yeonglonghan city light tumyeonghan neowa na
Bulhyeondeus seuchineun bul-angamdo eobsji oh ye
Heulishan red line seonmyeonghan moving-gwa
Jeogjeolhage seumyeodeulgo issneun uli oh ye
Meomulda gan heunjeogjocha chaj-anael su eobsneun uli dul

Soliga changbakk-eul mos neom-eogadolog eunmilhi aaa

We have a secret

Itolog aleumdaul suga



(Please tell me baby what to do)

Yeonsangkedoeneun bolakai hawai balli

Illeong-ineun padoleul dalm-eun party

Mwo dalli deosbut-il ge eobs-eo woo

Dambaeghan deus colorful woo ye

More & More & More

Nan ne geoya nae eodideun da

Kkwag jab-ado dwae



You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Ochaneun eobs-eo uli seoloui hab

You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Han geol-eumdo neoleul mos beos-eona



My circle, right

Baby u know how I feel circle, right

(I want to believe it, It’s u and me ye)

My circle, right

Baby u know how I feel circle, right

(I want to believe it, It’s u and me ye ye)



Tteol-eojineun chalnaleul chaj-anael su eobsneun uli teum

Han geol-eumdo meol-eojil su eobs-eo

Hana dwae eunmilhi aaa

We have a secret

Itolog aleumdaul suga



You know how I feel

Oh yeah, I see the Paradise

Neomu wanbyeoghan gwedowa gag

Heungmiloun i banboggwa nun-i busineun natural

We’re going higher alright, alright



You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Ochaneun eobs-eo uli seoloui hab

You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Han geol-eumdo neoleul mos beos-eona



Yeonglonghan city light tumyeonghan neowa na

Bulhyeondeus seuchineun bul-angamdo eobsji oh ye

Heulishan red line seonmyeonghan moving-gwa

Jeogjeolhage seumyeodeulgo issneun uli



You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Kkeut-i eobsneun hwangholham neowa na

You’re my circle

Baby you’re my circle, right

Ttaseuhan du nun-eul majuhan chae



My circle, right

Baby u know how I feel circle, right

(I want to believe it, It’s u and me ye)

My circle, right

Baby u know how I feel circle, right

(I want to believe it, It’s u and me ye ye)
